name: 李魁鵬
objective:
1. Compressors, evaporators, condensers, and refrigerant control technology
2. Refrigeration system design
schedule:
Week 1-3:
1. Theories of vapor compression refrigeration system
Week 4-6:
2. Compressors, evaporators, condensers, and refrigerant control technology
Week 7-9:
3. Refrigeration system design
Week 10-11
4. Advanced Defrost Methods
5. Lubrication and Oil Handling
Week 12-14:
6. Conservation, Reclaim, and Storage of Energy
Week 15-18:
7. Advanced Refrigeration and Freezing of Food
8. Advanced Refrigeration Load Calculations
9. Refrigerated Structures
scorePolicy:
作業、報告及課堂表現:30%
期中考35%
期末考35%
materials:
教材書名：
1. Industrial Refrigeration Handbook, 1998, Wilbert F. Stoecker, McGraw-Hill, Inc.
2. Roy J. Dossat, Principles of Refrigeration, Prentice Hall, 1997.
參考書籍：
1. Industrial Refrigeration: Principles, Design and Applications, 1992, P. C. Koelet, Marcel Dekker, Inc.
2. ASHRAE Handbook
3. 冷凍工程規劃管理, 何宗岳
